DataElement.preferredName: WI-PREPARE 2 Place of Work's Smoking Policy for Work Areas Category
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated response about the best description of their place of work's smoking policy for work areas.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Wisconsin Predicting Patients' Relapse Place of Work's Smoking Policy for Work Areas
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A brief, seven-item questionnaire that considers physical dependence, environmental factors, and individual difference characteristics in predicting a patient's relapse from smoking cessation._A question about the smoking policy in work areas at an individual's place of work.
